participant_1.background:
I put on my uniform and got ready to protect my city.
i love family time.
i never work more than 4 days in a row.
i love the walking dead.
I love spending time with my daughter and watching her grow into a smart, independent young woman.

participant_2.background:
I read my favorite comic books to take my mind off of things.
I enjoy getting my nails done as a way to relax and pamper myself.
I drive a car that is both reliable and fuel-efficient, so I can get to my business and music lessons on time.
I work as an online tutor during the hours that I am awake.
my parents are still married.

content.text: It's going well! I just got done with my online tutoring. How about you?
My day is going well. I just put on my uniform and got ready to protect my city.
Oh, that sounds exciting! What do you do for a living?
That's awesome! I always wanted to be a police officer when I was younger.
Really? Why did you change your mind?
I decided that I wanted to do something more creative. I'm now an online tutor and I also work as a musician.
That's awesome! I love music. What kind of music do you play?
I play the guitar and I sing. I also write my own songs.
That's amazing! I would love to hear you play sometime.
Sure! I'd love to play for you.
